note.p: Russian anthropologist. Secretary of the Naturalists’ Society of the Imperial University of Kazan. Prosector of anatomy, Kazan University, 1875–88. Professor of anatomy, Tomsk University, 1888–96. Assistant professor of anatomy, St Petersburg University, 1897–1916. His fate after 1916 is unknown. Worked on Bulgarian and Bashkir human skulls.
Nature, 1 March 1877, p. 382, and 28 June 1883, p. 213
